file.name: shanoir-ng-ms-studies-common.yaml
file.content:

openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Shanoir NG common Studies Microservice
  description: Common API for studies microservice
  version: 2.0.0
paths:
  /common:
    post:
      operationId: findStudySubjectCenterNamesByIds
      description: >-
        If exists, returns the study name, subject name, center name
        corresponding to the given ids
      requestBody:
        description: 'Object with center id, study id and subject id'
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CommonIdsDTO'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 'object with center name, study name and subject name'
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CommonIdNamesDTO'
        '401':
          description: unauthorized
        '403':
          description: forbidden
        '422':
          description: bad parameters
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorModel'
        '500':
          description: unexpected error
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorModel'
components:
  schemas:
    CommonIdsDTO:
      type: object
      properties:
        centerId:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        studyId:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        subjectId:
          type: integer
          format: int64
    CommonIdNamesDTO:
      type: object
      properties:
        center:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/IdNameDTO'
        study:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/IdNameDTO'
        subject:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/IdNameDTO'
    IdNameDTO:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        name:
          type: string
    ErrorModel:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        details:
          type: object
        message:
          type: string

Error: parse: paths: /common: post: operation "findStudySubjectCenterNamesByIds": responses: 422: resolve "#/components/schemas/ErrorModel" reference: invalid response reference: "#/components/schemas/ErrorModel"
